details.title: Share a photo/video or a favorite Charlie quote
details.description: Post a photo or video, or include a Charlie quote that inspires you. Tag 3 friends and invite them to act within 48 hours.

details.title: Pete & Bobby Challenge (Health)
details.description: Honor Charlie’s friends by choosing one healthy action today—walk a mile, make a healthy meal with family, or schedule a checkup—and share why health matters to your mission.

details.title: Share a verse with a friend
details.description: Pick a verse, include it in your caption, and tell why it matters right now.

details.title: Family Life
details.description: Do something intentional with your family (meal, game night, bay walk). Post the moment and why family is your priority.

details.title: Serve
details.description: Help a neighbor, teacher, veteran, or first responder. Share the story and how others can repeat it this week.

details.title: Forgive
details.description: Share a short forgiveness story (no private details needed) and encourage reconciliation.

details.title: Invite to Church
details.description: Personally invite someone and post a simple invite graphic or story.

details.title: Share Christ (Evangelism)
details.description: Share a testimony or talk about what following Jesus means to you.

details.title: Bridge Builder (Note/Call/Visit)
details.description: Write a thank‑you note, make a phone call, or visit someone who needs encouragement.

details.title: Public Testimony (Online Post)
details.description: State clearly what you believe and why—with humility and courage.

details.title: Film Night Host (Christian Film Night)
details.description: Host a watch party and pray/discuss afterward. Post the group pic + takeaways.

details.title: Favorite Charlie Video (Share + why)
details.description: Share a clip, add your takeaway, and tag 3 friends to share theirs.

details.title: Hands‑Free Driver (No phone while driving)
details.description: Pledge to put the phone away while driving today. Share the reminder to protect families on the road.

details.title: Family Table Focus (Streak)
details.description: Eat together without screens for 3+ nights. Post what changed.

details.title: Quiet Time Focus (Streak)
details.description: Set a daily window for Scripture/prayer for 7 days. Share one insight.

details.title: Honor Service (Thank a First Responder)
details.description: Deliver a thank‑you and a small gift. Post the story (with permission).

details.title: Creator Proceeds Donor
details.description: Donate proceeds from your video/stream/book for the day. Post the receipt (blur private info).

details.title: YouTube Proceeds Donor
details.description: Pledge one stream’s ads/superchat to charity. Share the proof link or screenshot.

details.title: Phone Off at Church
details.description: Go distraction‑free during worship. Post a simple graphic reminder.

details.title: Inspire
details.description: Share an original encouragement for others choosing, like Charlie.

details.title: BakeLikeCharlie (Bake & Sell)
details.description: Host a bake sale with family or youth. Donate proceeds and post the story.

details.title: Generations Badge (Family of 3+ generations)
details.description: Grandparent + parent + child complete an action together and share a photo/story.

details.title: Gold Standard — Doing It All
details.description: Do at least one action in every category this month. Post your highlight reel.
